title: Twitter Is Being So Savagely Mean About Larsa Pippen After Last Night's 'KUWTK'
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Fans are dragging Larsa Pippen thanks to her behavior during Sunday night's episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians.

Larsa has responded to criticism via Twitter, and Khloé Kardashian came to her defense.

So, Kourtney Kardashian's BFF Larsa Pippen showed up during Sunday night's Keeping Up with the Kardashians, and apparently fans were not thrilled about her presence. Larsa joined Kourtney and Khloé Kardashian for a girls trip, and the show portrayed her as being super into partying and meeting "some guys from Miami," while Kourtney just wanted to be chill. Plus, there was drama between Larsa and Poosh COO Sarah Howard, who also wanted to have a more chill time.

Anyway, now poor Larsa is getting fully dragged by KUWTK fans. Comments range from "Why is Larsa Pippen always around? As we’ve seen before, she’s nothing but a mean girl who starts drama. Don’t have a good feeling about her," to "Ew @larsapippen is THAT woman on a girls trip #KUWTK she needs to act her age."

Why is @larsapippen Larsa Pippen always around? As we’ve seen before, she’s nothing but a mean girl who starts drama. Don’t have a good feeling about her #KUWTK pic.twitter.com/i3GRdAkyyH — Ժҽղíտҽ ɾҽղҽҽ (@deniserenee24) October 21, 2019

@larsapippen girl, just be quiet! You were being a bully and a mean girl. @kourtneykardash was too nice to tell you, but we will! It’s not cool the way you were talking to Kourtney’s friend, and when somebody calls you on it, they see it to, so chill out!!!#KUWTK pic.twitter.com/QNBwGW8aLU — Ժҽղíտҽ ɾҽղҽҽ (@deniserenee24) October 21, 2019

Meanwhile, other people are accusing her of ruining our beloved KUWTK:

Please Please its becoming harder and harder to watch this show. DO NOT I repeat DO Not start putting more of @larsapippen on.. 😏#KUWTK pic.twitter.com/9EZiaSvt8R — Cookiecam21 (@Cookiecam21) October 21, 2019

And to be honest a lot of the tweets are pretty unkind:

I feel sad that Psalm will look back at his birth episode and it’ll be filled with Larsa Pippen being a fuckin 16 year old mean girl bitch the entire episode #KUWTK — Sean (@Officialseand93) October 21, 2019

Larsa defended herself, saying "I didn’t mean to be dismissive to Sarah I just didn’t think we should be getting involved in any type of domestic situation when we’re out of the country," but nope, fans aren't having it:



What an excuse.. if that’s how you felt why didn’t you say that in the episode? Cuz all I heard was you “didn’t wanna kill kourtneys vibe” just own up to the fact that you were rude and were being a “bully” 🙄🙄 — Sean (@Officialseand93) October 21, 2019

Meanwhile, Khloé jumped in to say Larsa "is a great friend to Kourt and she has a great heart. Sarah and her are simply different people. But both are good souls." And people are accusing her of doing damage control since everyone's coming for Larsa:

Damage control tweet because everyone is trashing larsa haha — Jake (@Jake9537) October 21, 2019
